testcase.name: Check Delivered Button Exists
testcase.system-out: Given the user opens the application........................................passed And the user logs in the application........................................passed And the user sees the "Welcome" screen......................................passed And the user sees the Assigned Orders list..................................passed When the user clicks on one of the "Assigned Order Item" in the Assigned Orders list.passed Then the user sees the "Order Details" screen...............................passed And the user sees the "Delivered" button....................................passed

testcase.name: Check Balance Text Exists
testcase.system-out: Given the user opens the application........................................passed And the user logs in the application........................................passed And the user sees the "Welcome" screen......................................passed Then the user sees that the "Balance Value" text exists.....................passed

testcase.name: Check Successful Complete Handover By Button Delivered
testcase.system-out: Given the user opens the application........................................passed And the user logs in the application........................................passed And the user sees the "Welcome" screen......................................passed And the user sees the Assigned Orders list..................................passed And the user sees the Balance value.........................................passed When the user clicks on one of the "Assigned Order Item" in the Assigned Orders list.passed And the user sees how much he is going to earn for that delivery............passed And the user clicks on the "Delivered" button...............................passed Then the user sees the "Welcome" screen.....................................passed And the user sees that the clicked order item is not in the Assigned Orders list.passed And the user sees that the balance has gone up..............................passed
